articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Actual Maneuvers of KPA Large Combined Units
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Actual Maneuvers of KPA Large Combined Units
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Actual maneuvers for attack and defence between large combined units of the Korean People's Army (KPA) were staged in three directions at the same time.
					 In the maneuvers a defence task was carried out by units of the KPA 91st Metropolitan Defense Corps and an attack task by units of the KPA 105th Tank Division and 425th and 815th Motorized Infantry Divisions.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the KPA, guided the maneuvers at a three-direction forward command post, learning about them in other two directions through a display.
					
					 The maneuvers were aimed to further round off the operational preparedness for reliably defending Pyongyang, the capital of the revolution, from any enemy attack by confirming the offensive and defensive operation capability through a drill for laying and overcoming obstacles between units and taking relevant steps.
					
					 After receiving a report on the maneuvers plan at an observation post, the Supreme Commander guided the maneuvers.
					
					 He referred to the merits and demerits of the maneuvers and advanced important tasks that would serve as guidelines in further strengthening the KPA into ever-victorious revolutionary armed forces by intensifying training the way the anti-Japanese guerrillas did in Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The maneuvers proved again that, in order to cope with a fierce, severe and cruel war, it is useless to conduct any drill unrelated to war and unfit for war environment, a drill of formalism, stereotyped pattern and stylish manner, he said, stressing: Commanding personnel and officers of the staff should turn all military trainings into practical and actual drills and practical brain drills with the unshakable Juche-based stand and attitude towards war.
					
					  He indicated one by one such principled matters arising in rounding off the combat readiness as enhancing the initiative, independence and creativity of commanding personnel and officers of the staff so that they can skillfully command operations and combats in keeping with the demand and conditions of modern warfare and the characters for carrying out their units' combat duty, bringing the party political work close to war environment so as to arouse soldiers to victory in combats, enhancing the responsibility and role of training reviewers to ensure drills under battle conditions, giving the same strict review of drills as that of combats, and making preparations in advance to take up a strong defensive position in any lines by making an effective use of natural and geographical conditions of the country.
					
					 He expressed belief that all the men and officers of the KPA would perform great merits in defending the socialist country, deeply aware that they should ensure the security of the country and its people's happiness with arms.
					
					 He was greeted at the drill ground by Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, Army General Ri Myong Su, chief of the KPA General Staff, Army Lieut. Gen. Rim Kwang Il, first vice-chief of the KPA General Staff and director of its General Operation Bureau, Army Lieut. Gen. Jo Nam Jin, vice-director of the Organizational Department of the KPA General Political Bureau, Army Lieut. Gen. Pang Kwan Bok, vice-chief of the KPA General Staff and director of its Combat Drill Department, Lieut. Gen. Kim Myong Nam, commander of the KPA 91st Metropolitan Defense Corps, Maj. Gen. Kim To Un, its political commissar, Lieut. Gen. Ko Myong Su, commander of the KPA 815th Motorized Infantry Division, and Maj. Gen. Ju Song Nam, its political commissar.
					
					 Watching the drill were executive members of the KPA Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, engineer commanding officers and instructors of the military academies at all levels.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Watches Flight Drill of KPA Fighter Pilots
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Watches Flight Drill of KPA Fighter Pilots
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, inspected a flight drill of fighter pilots of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force.
					 He called without notice various types of fighters to a highway-airfield and inspected fighter pilots' aviation on the spot.
					
					 He was greeted by General Choe Yong Ho, commander of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force, and Col. General Son Chol Ju, political commissar of a large combined unit.
					
					 Taking part in the drill were Units 1017, 447 and 458 of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force.
					
					 It is very satisfied to see the pilots steering fighters at their own will and they are good at take-off and landing operation in an unfamiliar and unfavorable highway-airfield, the Supreme Commander said.
					
					 He noted with high appreciation that the drill for inspection was well done under the unexpected situation and the reliable pilots of our Party are ready to make sortie if they are given orders anytime.
					
					 He further said:
					
					 As I have stressed whenever I see a drill of fighter pilots, the defence of the country's territorial air is not tied to the weather and time and a modern warfare is to be conducted in the worst condition.
					
					 That is why the pilots should conduct flight drills under battle conditions with a high level of ideological consciousness and thus prepare themselves as competent combat aviators, all-round pilots who are able to creditably discharge their air combat duty in any unfavorable circumstance.
					
					 Repeatedly expressing his satisfaction over the successful flight drill, he urged the fighter pilots to intensify the drill with a higher goal and make great success in rounding off the combat readiness of the air force with the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea as an occasion.
					
					 Accompanying him were Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces; Army General Ri Myong Su, chief of the KPA General Staff; Army Lieut. Gen. Rim Kwang Il, first vice-chief of the KPA General Staff and director of its General Operation Bureau; and Army Lieut. Gen. Jo Nam Jin, vice-director of the Organizational Department of the KPA General Political Bureau.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The Jilin Provincial Symphony Orchestra of China led by Su Wei, deputy director-general of the Cultural Department of Jilin Province, Sunday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill.
					 They laid bunches of flowers before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Jilin Provincial Symphony Orchestra of China
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Jilin Provincial Symphony Orchestra of China
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from the Jilin Provincial Symphony Orchestra of China on a visit to the DPRK.
					 It was handed over to an official concerned on Sunday.

articles.title: Japanese Police Authorities' Search Offices of Economic Organizations of Chongryon Slammed
articles.content:
Japanese Police Authorities' Search Offices of Economic Organizations of Chongryon Slammed
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The Japan Police Agency on Feb. 18 hurled the police corps of the joint investigation headquarters grouping police headquarters in Kyoto, Kanagawa, Yamaguchi and Shimane prefectures into search operations against offices of economic organizations under the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon). 
					 In the morning of that day, the police authorities arrested the manager of a Korean trading company on charges of the violation of the "law on foreign exchange" on the charge that he illegally exported garment, foodstuffs and sundry goods for daily use to the DPRK through Singapore in 2014. 
					
					 In connection with this case, they hurled more than 50 investigators into search operations against the Tokyo Metropolitan Chamber of Commerce and Industry of Chongryon in the Korean Commercial Workers Hall and the Office of the Federation of Joint Economic Venture of Korean Residents in Japan for four hours and thirty minutes.
					
					 This is serious politically-motivated terrorism to infringe upon the sovereignty of the DPRK, put pressure upon officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan and obliterate Chongryon at any cost as part of the sanctions slapped by the Abe regime against the DPRK and Chongryon.
					
					 The Chongryon Central Standing Committee held an emergency meeting and dispatched officials of the committee to the Federation of Joint Economic Venture of Korean Residents in Japan and the Korean Commercial Workers Hall in order to take steps against the search operations.
					
					 The committee declared that it would carry on protest actions against the Japanese police authorities' unreasonable politically-motivated crackdown.

articles.title: Joint Action for Punishing Traitorous Regime Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Joint Action for Punishing Traitorous Regime Declared in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- More than 20 organizations of south Korea formed the "Headquarters of Joint Action for 2016 General Election".
					 A press conference was held in Seoul on Feb. 18 as regards the inauguration.
					
					 Speakers underlined the need to show the mindset of the enraged people against the traitorous regime in the April "National Assembly" election.
					
					 Then a press release was read out.

articles.title: Murder Cases Unabated in S. Korea
articles.content:
Murder Cases Unabated in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed in south Korea on Feb. 15 that a woman in her 40s killed her daughter, according to MBC of south Korea.
					 The woman beat her daughter with a whip to death for the mere reason that she did not obey her mother in October, 2011. Then the woman buried the dead body on a hillock of Kwangju, Kyonggi Province.
					
					 The eight-year-old daughter at that time was reported to be subject to serious maltreatment and violence by her mother every day, failing to enter school.

articles.title: Concert Held in U.S. to Celebrate Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
Concert Held in U.S. to Celebrate Day of Shining Star
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- A concert "Spring of February" was given by Korean artistes in the U.S. and American artistes with splendor at a theater in New York City on Feb. 13 on the occasion of the 74th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 Among the audience were Koreans in the U.S., staff members of the DPRK permanent mission at the UN, foreign diplomatic envoys at the UN and Americans.
					
					 The concert began with orchestra "Road of Victory" conducted by Ri Jun Mu, head of the Uruk Symphony Orchestra.
					
					 The orchestra mesmerized the audience as it represented the revolutionary careers of the peerlessly great men who exalted the dignity of the country and the nation before the world with the great ideas and outstanding leadership and the unshakable revolutionary faith of the service personnel and people to weather any ordeals and storm of history.
					
					 Put on the stage were orchestra "Footstep" and clarinet and orchestra "Ardent Desire" in praise of Marshal Kim Jong Un. Their solemn and dynamic melody reflected the sky-high spirit of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					 Also presented were orchestra "The Girl on the Swing" and songs reflecting excellent culture and optimistic life of the Korean people and foreign classical music.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Observed in Sweden
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked by Political Parties, Organizations of Northern Europe
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Progressive political parties and organizations in northern Europe held a joint meeting in Sweden on Feb. 13 to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 Present at the meeting were figures of progressive political parties, organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people and organizations for the study of the Juche idea and other masses in Sweden, Finland, Denmark and Norway and the DPRK ambassador to Sweden and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 The participants laid bouquets and flowers before the picture of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il standing together and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, the chairman of the Finland-Korea Society and the chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association and other speakers lauded Kim Jong Il as the peerlessly great man who made great contributions to the country's prosperity, peace and reunification in the Korean Peninsula and sacred cause of global independence, saying that they were pleased to hold a joint meeting of progressive political parties and organizations in northern Europe on the occasion of the significant Day of the Shining Star.
					
					 A statement was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 It said: The military threat to the DPRK is not symbolic but potential.
					
					 The U.S. has turned down all proposals made by the DPRK for concluding a peace treaty and denuclearizing the Korean Peninsula for several decades.
					
					 We can never allow the application of another "law" against the DPRK which has the legitimate right to develop space like other countries.
					
					 The Nordic countries should fulfill their past commitments to strive for the detente in the Korean Peninsula and friendly relations with the DPRK.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Russia
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Seminars on leader Kim Jong Il's exploits were held by the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia and the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia on February 11 and 13.
					 A reporter and speakers including the chairwoman of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia said that Kim Jong Il was the great leader who enjoyed absolute support and trust of the Korean people in the whole period of leading the revolution.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 Thanks to his outstanding leadership the unity and cohesion of the party, army and people of the DPRK grew rock-solid and the Korean people could achieve eye-opening successes in all fields for building socialism.
					
					 The director of the International Affairs Department of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia said that Kim Jong Il was an outstanding politician who smashed all obstructive moves of the imperialists by pursuing the great Songun politics and firmly defended socialism and the father of the people who regarded believing in the people as in Heaven as his maxim and devoted all his life to them.
					
					 He sincerely wished the Korean people greater successes in the struggle for ushering in a golden age in building a thriving socialist nation this year when the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea is to be held.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Peruvian, Nepalese Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Peruvian, Nepalese Personages
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Personages of Peru and Nepal issued statements on Feb. 10 and 12 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Cati Campos Rontop, general secretary of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed and enriched the Juche idea and Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung as required by the era and the developing revolution through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities.
					
					 He kindled the torch of the industrial revolution in the new century across the country and ushered in the age of knowledge-based economy.
					
					 He devoted his all to the country's prosperity and people's happiness.
					
					 He turned the Workers' Party of Korea into the invincible guiding force, the DPRK into the invincible socialist state and the Korean People's Army into the matchless one.
					
					 Today the Korean people are honored to live a happy life thanks to his devoted efforts for laying an eternal foundation for building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The chairman of the Socialist Journalist Forum of Nepal said that the world progressive people are significantly celebrating Kim Jong Il's birth anniversary as the Day of the Shining Star and extending support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for building a thriving nation and reunifying the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Angolan Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Angolan Organization
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- An Angolan preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) issued a statement on Feb. 12.
					 The statement paid high tribute to HE Kim Jong Il who made undying contributions to the cause of human independence on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.
					
					 It said that Kim Jong Il who was the gifted thinker and theoretician and possessed of outstanding political caliber led the Korean people only to victory with his unique Songun politics, thus demonstrating the national dignity and honor before the whole world.
					
					 It noted that the Korean people fully demonstrated the national power of Songun Korea before the world, winning victory after victory such as world-startling launches of satellites by their own efforts and technology as they have HE Kim Jong Un who is identical to Kim Jong Il as supreme leader.
					
					 The statement expressed the belief that the Korean people would register bigger success in their struggle for accomplishing the cause of building a thriving socialist nation and achieving the country's independent and peaceful reunification, expressing the will to further boost the friendship and solidarity with them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Bangladesh
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Cause of the Great Party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Is Ever-Victorious" was published in booklet by a publishing house in Dhaka City, Bangladesh.
					 The work, published on October 4, Juche 104 (2015), clarifies the idea that the seven decade-long history of the Workers' Party of Korea is the one of victory which demonstrated the validity and invincibility of the cause of the party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and that the cause of the party is always sure to triumph.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on February 14.

articles.title: Homepage for Introducing DPRK Opened by Italian Organization
articles.content:
Homepage for Introducing DPRK Opened by Italian Organization
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The Milano Center for the Study of the Juche Idea opened a homepage for introducing the DPRK on its website on Feb. 15 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The homepage carried the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and photos of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It also carried photos dealing with their exploits.
					
					 Posted on it were their works, and articles dealing with the validity and vitality of the Juche idea and Songun idea.

articles.title: Spanish Party Hails DPRK's Satellite Launch
articles.content:
Spanish Party Hails DPRK's Satellite Launch
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Communist Party of the People of Spain made public a statement on Feb. 11 to hail the DPRK's successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4.
					 Lambasting the imperialists' accusation against the DPRK's satellite launch, the statement said:
					
					 We wholeheartedly respect the sovereignty of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. 
					
					 The DPRK is vigorously advancing along the road of socialism.
					
					 It is struggling to reunify the country divided due to the U.S. imperialists' military intervention, firmly preserving its anti-imperialist nature. 
					
					 It is self-evident that geographical and cultural differences between Spain and the DPRK cannot be obstacles to introducing the socio-economic progress in the DPRK and extending our heartfelt solidarity with its people.
					
					 We categorically reject the false propaganda and ceaseless moves for aggression against the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige entrenamiento de grandes unidades combinadas de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige entrenamiento de grandes unidades combinadas de EPC
Pyongyang, 21 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar al mismo tiempo en las tres direcciones el entrenamiento practico para ataque y defensa entre las grandes unidades combinadas del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					En la ocasion las unidades subordinadas al Cuerpo de Defensa de la Capital 91 del EPC cumplieron la mision de defensa, y las unidades subordinadas a la Division de Tanques 105 y las divisiones 425 y 815 de infanteria motorizada, la mision de ataque.
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un dirigio el entrenamiento en el puesto de mando avanzado de la tercera direccion, averiguando por la pantalla los ejercicios que se realizan en otras dos direcciones.
					
					El presente simulacro por la disposicion y el vencimiento de los obstaculos tiene objeto de perfeccionar mas los preparativos operacionales para defender con firmeza Pyongyang, capital de la revolucion, desde cualquier agresion de los enemigos confirmando las capacidades operacionales de ataque y defensa, captar problemas presentados y tomar medidas correspondientes.
					
					En el puesto de mando, el Mariscal dirigio los ejercicio tras recibir el parte sobre el plan de entrenamiento.
					
					El Mariscal aprecio y critico los meritos y desmeritos del entrenamiento y presento las tareas programaticas que sirven de guia para fortalecer mas el EPC como invencibles fuerzas armadas revolucionarias al avivar con vigor el fervor de ejercicios del monte Paektu.
					
					El entrenamiento de hoy comprobo de nuevo que para enfrentar con la guerra enconada, severa y dura son inutiles los ejercicios ajenos de la guerra, los no adecuados al ambiente de la guerra, y los formalizados, acostumbrados y emperifollados que se realizaran cientos y miles de veces, dijo y continuo que los comandantes y los funcionarios del Estado Mayor deben poseer el firme punto de vista y la posicion autoctonos con respecto a la guerra y transformar todos los entrenamientos en los ejercicios utiles, practicos y reales de cerebros.
					
					Y aclaro uno tras otro los asuntos de principios que se presentan en la preparacion combativa perfecta, entre otros, el de elevar la iniciativa, la independencia y la creatividad de los comandantes y funcionarios de Estado Mayor para mandar con habilidad las operaciones y combates segun la demanda y los aspectos de la guerra moderna y las caracteristicas del cumplimiento de la mision combativa de las unidades, el de acercar la labor politica del Partido al ambiente belico para llamar a los militares a la victoria en el lugar de combate, el de elevar la responsabilidad y el papel de jueces de entrenamiento para realizar los ejercicios en el ambiente real, el de hacer estrictamente el balance de entrenamiento como el de combate real y el de preparar preventivamente para que puedan organizar la firme defensa en cualquier linea utilizando eficazmente las condiciones natural y geofisica de nuestro pais que forma la fortaleza natural.
					
					El Mariscal expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC realizaran los orgullosos meritos militares en la lucha para defender la patria socialista guardando en lo profundo del corazon la conciencia de garantizar con fusiles la seguridad de la patria y la felicidad del pueblo.
					
					El Mariscal fue recibido en el lugar de entrenamiento por el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres del EPC Pak Yong Sik, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres del EPC, Ri Myong Su, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, el teniente general de las fuerzas terrestres Rim Kwang Il, primer subjefe del EMG del EPC y director de su buro de operaciones, el teniente general de las fuerzas terrestres Jo Nam Jin, subdirector de Organizacion de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el teniente general de las fuerzas terrestres Pang Kwan Bok, subjefe del Estado Mayor General y director de Entrenamiento de Combate, el teniente general de las fuerzas terrestres Kim Myong Nam, jefe del Cuerpo de Defensa de la Capital 91 del EPC, el mayor general de las fuerzas terrestres Kim To Un, comisario politico del mismo cuerpo, el teniente general de las fuerzas terrestres Ko Myong Su, jefe de la division  de infanteria motorizada
					
					815 y el mayor general de las fuerzas terrestres Ju Song Nam, comisario politico de la misma division.
					
					El entrenamiento lo vieron los miembros ejecutivos del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en el EPC, los comandantes de ingenieros y los profesores de las escuelas militares a todos niveles.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia vuelo de inspeccion de fuerzas aereas y antiaereas de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia vuelo de inspeccion de fuerzas aereas y antiaereas de EPC
Pyongyang, 21 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un presencio el entrenamiento de vuelo de inspeccion de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					El Mariscal llamo inesperadamente a la autopista los aviones de varias especias e hizo la revision de calificacion en el terreno la aeronautica de los pilotos.
					
					El Mariscal fue recibido por el general de ejercito de las fuerzas aereas, Choe Yong Ho, comandante de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC y el coronel general de las fuerzas aereas, Son Chol Ju, comisario politico de la gran unidad combinada.
					
					En el ejercicio participaron las unidades 1017, 447 y 458 de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC.
					
					Es muy digno de ver que los pilotos manejan con facilidad los cazas como si fueran palma de su mano, dijo y senalo que hacen muy bien el despegue y aterrizaje en la desconocida y desfavorable autopista. Y continuo que se realizo muy bien el vuelo de inspeccion organizado inesperadamente por el mismo y aprecio altamente diciendo que los dignos pilotos del Partido estan preparados siempre para salir a atacar si reciben la orden en cualquier tiempo.
					
					Como el hablaba reiteradamente en cada entrenamiento de pilotos, la defensa del espacio aereo jurisdiccional de la patria no deben realizarse segun el tiempo y la hora adecuados y la guerra moderna se desarrolla en las condiciones pesimas, razon por la cual los pilotos deben realizar el entrenamiento de vuelo con alta conciencia ideologica y en el ambiente de combate real para prepararse perfectamente como pilotos competentes y omnipotentes que cumplen con exito la mision asumida de combate aereo en cualquier situacion desfavorable, dijo.
					
					El Mariscal expreso su satisfaccion reiterada por el exitoso entrenamiento y exhorto a los pilotos a lograr grandes exitos en la perfeccion de los preparativos combativos de las fuerzas aereas en ocasion del VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, al determinar la meta alta y dar gran impulso al entrenamiento.
					
					Le acompanaron el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres del Ejercito Popular de Corea Pak Yong Sik, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres del EPC, Ri Myong Su, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, el teniente general de las fuerzas terrestres Rim Kwang Il, primer subjefe del EMG del EPC y director de operaciones y el teniente general de las fuerzas terrestres Jo Nam Jin, subdirector de Organizacion de la Direccion Politica General del EPC.
